rooms.name: Attic
rooms.first_text: You are in the pitch-black attic, navigating through musty darkness. The only sound is your cautious steps on creaking floorboards...
rooms.after_text: You are back in the attic.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.first_text: You are standing in a wide hallway, doors lead in various directions, the air heavy with dust and decay...

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.first_text: The bedroom is cold and unwelcoming, the remains of a life once lived now gone. You notice a pistol on the bedside table...

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.first_text: Mold lines the edges of the bathtub, a grimy mirror reflects a room long neglected. Something gleams beneath the sink...
items: Key for stairs between Office Room and Living Room

rooms.name: Office Room
rooms.first_text: Papers and books are strewn across the office room, a testament to a mind once focused on work now abandoned...
rooms.after_text: You are in the Office Room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.first_text: The living room feels strangely homely despite the chaos, pictures on the wall hint at happier times...
rooms.after_text: You are in the Living Room.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.first_text: Utensils and plates are scattered around the kitchen. In the dim light, you spot a flashlight inside a cupboard...

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.first_text: The garage is cluttered with tools and old furniture. Dust covers everything, except for a journal that seems recently placed...

rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.first_text: The grand foyer offers a false sense of welcome, its grand staircase leading nowhere, the front door firmly shut...

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.first_text: Descending into the basement, an impenetrable darkness engulfs you. You fumble for the flashlight...
